One of the best Indian restaurants in the Bay Area, Ajanta features a rotating menu of delicious Indian specialties...
This restful Indian eatery is named for Buddhist cave temples in India and features beautiful, sensual reproductions...
Chef Lachu Moorjani keeps diners coming back with an ever-changing menu of regional specialties.
Chef-owner Lachu Moorjani offers moderately priced pan-regional Indian fare and attentive service.
